byline.original: By ERIC DASH and EVELYN M. RUSLI
byline.contributor: Julie Creswell and Graham Bowley contributed reporting.

abstract: European leaders report progress on framework of broad bank rescue package, but investors fear plan will not be large enough to solve problems stemming from sovereign debt crisis; size of plan is reportedly 100 billion euros ($138 billion).
snippet: Investors fear that the bank rescue plan being negotiated by European officials will not be large enough to solve the problems stemming from the sovereign debt crisis.
lead_paragraph: Investors fear that the bank rescue plan being negotiated by European officials will not be large enough to solve the problems stemming from the sovereign debt crisis.

headline.main: Investors Wait Warily for Europe Bank Rescue
headline.print_headline: Investors Wait Warily For Europe Bank Rescue
headline.seo: Europeans Report Progress on Bank Rescue Plan
